Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO SOCIAL SERVICES
REFERENCE CHANGED TO CHILDREN AND FAMILIES
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CHILDREN AND FAMILIES

Title: Implements automatic market rate increases for child care assistance
Summary: Implements automatic market rate increases for child care assistance such that assistance will be equal to the applicable payment rate established by the department.
LawCode: Amd ยง410-x, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to implementing a cost estimation model and automatic market rate increases for child care assistance
